text: Lioudmila Skavronskaia (; born 23 March 1980) is a former Russian tennis player. Skavronskaia has a career high WTA singles ranking of 124, achieved on 19 July 2004. Skavronskaia also has a career high WTA doubles ranking of 270 achieved on 19 November 2014. Skavronskaia has won 4 ITF singles titles and 1 ITF doubles titles.
